featured.text: Concert reviews from the period mourned the fact that the armonica sounded wonderful—only when it could be heard.

definition.zh_def: 對某人的去世或損失感到悲傷或哀悼。
definition.en_def: To feel or show deep sorrow or regret for someone or something that has died or been lost.
definition.example: They mourned the loss of their beloved pet.
